entry.title: Thursday night: Rain. Temperature steady near plus 4.
entry.summary: Rain ending overnight then cloudy. Fog patches. Amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Wind becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 overnight. Temperature steady near plus 4. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Thursday 23 March 2023
